ingredients.name: Tomato Sauce
ingredients.description: A rich sauce made from tomatoes, used as a base for many pizzas.

ingredients.name: Mozzarella Cheese
ingredients.description: A soft, white cheese used commonly on pizzas, known for its melting properties.

ingredients.name: Basil
ingredients.description: An aromatic herb with a sweet, peppery flavor, often used fresh.

ingredients.name: Pepperoni
ingredients.description: A spicy, cured sausage made from pork and beef, sliced thinly for pizza toppings.

ingredients.name: Ham
ingredients.description: Cured pork, often sliced thinly, used in Hawaiian and other pizza varieties.

ingredients.name: Pineapple
ingredients.description: Sweet tropical fruit, used as a topping especially in Hawaiian pizzas.

ingredients.name: Anchovies
ingredients.description: Small, salt-cured fish filets, giving a strong umami flavor on pizzas.

ingredients.name: Olives
ingredients.description: Fruit of the olive tree, often used in slices on pizzas for a tangy taste.

ingredients.name: Artichokes
ingredients.description: A thistle plant vegetal, used as a pizza topping for its tender texture.

ingredients.name: Mushrooms
ingredients.description: Fungi with a meaty texture and earthy flavor, commonly used on vegetarian and other pizzas.

ingredients.name: Bell Peppers
ingredients.description: Sweet peppers in various colors, used for their crunch and color on pizzas.

ingredients.name: Onions
ingredients.description: Bulb vegetables used for their pungency and sweetness when cooked.

ingredients.name: Parmesan Cheese
ingredients.description: A hard, aged cheese with a nutty flavor used to top pizzas.

ingredients.name: Gorgonzola
ingredients.description: A veined Italian blue cheese, known for its strong and bold flavor.

ingredients.name: Provolone
ingredients.description: An Italian cheese with a mild flavor, used in Four Cheese pizzas.

ingredients.name: Ricotta
ingredients.description: A creamy, mild cheese used in combination with other cheeses on pizzas.

ingredients.name: Cherry Tomatoes
ingredients.description: Small, sweet tomatoes, often halved and used fresh on Caprese pizzas.

ingredients.name: Olive Oil
ingredients.description: A flavorful oil pressed from olives, used to enhance the flavor of pizzas.

ingredients.name: Garlic
ingredients.description: A pungent bulb used to add depth of flavor to pizzas and sauces.

ingredients.name: Oregano
ingredients.description: A herb with a slightly bitter taste, often used dried for seasoning pizzas.
